General.Name: Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited
General.Description: Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes consumer goods in Thailand and internationally. The company distributes food and beverage, household, personal care, and other products. It also invests in real estate; rents office buildings; and provides instant noodles, coffee, mineral water, and yoghurt, as well as plastic packaging products. The company distributes its products through traditional and modern trade stores, including superstores and supermarket convenience stores, as well as special channels. Saha Pathanapibul Public Company Limited was founded in 1942 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
